author: etan_status
content:
hey, wondering about the best way. All of SSZ / typed-transactions / light-clients / log-reform are kinda one bucket, and some form of consolidation would probably help.
Right now, I think a cross-layer "purified-web3" would stick best, as all of it sort of relates to the notion of a trust-minimized / decrapified web3 API.
The canonical site right now is https://purified-web3.box with the latest activity on the linked Telegram. It would be great to have a working Telegram <-> Discord bridge for better visibility!
I'm not sure if we need separate <#1295427781722898505> , <#779922457631916064> and <#595701319793377299> at this stage. Maybe <#595701319793377299> could remain its own thing, given its CL focus, but the rest can prob be merged.
